Blocky Friends are special creatures that have the ability to grow or shrink. Grow taller to avoid the obstacles along the road. As you move over obstacles, your Blocky Friend will lose some blocks and shrink back down to normal size. Watch out for obstacles up top, too! Grow too tall and you wonâ€™t be able to avoid them. If you bump into things and come to a stop, the game will end and the level will need to be restarted. Collect the coins along the way to buy new and exciting Blocky Friends. Play Blocky Friends online on your mobile phone, tablet or computer.
